General.Name: Santa Rosa Resources Corp
General.Description: Santa Rosa Resources Corp. does not have significant operations. Previously, the company was engaged in the provision of billing, payments processing, call center, and ISP services. It is exploring potential business opportunities in various markets. The company was formerly known as Monexa Technologies Corp. and changed its name to Santa Rosa Resources Corp. in March 2012. Santa Rosa Resources Corp. was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1177 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2K3
